amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to enter into contracts with individuals or entities convicted of fraud.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to enter into contracts with individuals or entities convicted of fraud.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Grayson.
